triplets: Furniture designed for seating one or more people, commonly found indoors and outdoors
Sitting, resting, social interaction, or as part of public and private spaces
Wood, metal, plastic, concrete, or a combination of materials depending on design and purpose
Seat, the horizontal surface for sitting
Legs that provide support and stability
Backrest (optional) for additional comfort and support
Varies depending on material and manufacturer; can be natural wood, painted, or metal-coated
Parks, gardens, bus stops, schools, homes, and public spaces
Various manufacturers producing indoor and outdoor furniture
Typically 15–50 kg depending on material, size, and design
Approximately 40–50 cm from floor to seat surface
Typically 5–15 years depending on material quality, exposure to elements, and maintenance
